name: Polytope Episode One: Tesseract
description:
Polytope is a story-driven game that emerges from the perspective of a cube. 
Begin the journey to rediscover who you are with the help of higher entities.
Master the rules of this unique cubic universe and unite with the cube.

Explore every known dimension and try to remember your true nature. 

The cube is not the only subject in this vast space. You will need to discover who or what is helping this cute little entity.

Geometry repeats.  Remember.

 

  • Story-driven platform-adventure.
  • A visually simple world filled with glitches and hidden alleys.
  • Explore the chapters of a cube’s memory.

 

PC Controls:

  • Arrows or WASD - Moving
  • Space or Shift - Jump
  • Esc - Pause
  • M - Mute/Unmute (in game)
  • Q - Quit (pause menu)
  • Mouse - menu interactions

During a different chapter in the game Tab or Ctrl are also used as it’s written on-screen instructions.

 *Note: Windows Defender does not recognize this game installer because the developers of gdevelop engine haven't provided a signature for this app yet. Nothing to worry about. You can safely install this game. 

If you spot any bug please let me know, nikolaign@gmail.com

Musical compositions by Witold Lutosławski, John Cage and Karlheinz Stockhausen.

Sounds from opengameart.

Made in gDevelop engine.

 

Token of appreciation <3
